org.openimaj.feature.local.matcher.consistent

Class ConsistentLocalFeatureMatcher2d<T extends LocalFeature<?,?> & Point2d>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.feature.local.matcher.consistent.ConsistentLocalFeatureMatcher2d<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of LocalFeature
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelFittingLocalFeatureMatcher<T>, LocalFeatureMatcher<T>

    public class ConsistentLocalFeatureMatcher2d<T extends LocalFeature<?,?> & Point2d>
extends Object
implements ModelFittingLocalFeatureMatcher<T>
    Object to attempt to find a consistent geometric mapping of two sets of local features according to a given model. The initial matching is performed by a separate matcher that is provided in the constructor. The list of initial matches is then passed to the modelfitter which attempts to estimate the model and provide a list of inlier pairs, which are then used to populate the consistent matches.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare
